properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of the presentation to create

properties.name: presentationId
properties.description: ID of the presentation to retrieve. Found in the presentation URL: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/PRESENTATION_ID/edit

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: pageObjectId
properties.description: ID of the page object to retrieve

properties.name: textUi
properties.description: Whether the search should respect case. True : the search is case sensitive. False : the search is case insensitive.

properties.name: pageObjectIds
properties.description: If non-empty, limits the matches to page elements only on the given pages. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: replaceText
properties.description: The text that will replace the matched text

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text to search for in the shape or table

properties.name: options
properties.description: The revision ID of the presentation required for the write request. If specified and the requiredRevisionId doesn't exactly match the presentation's current revisionId, the request will not be processed and will return a 400 bad request error.

properties.name: download
properties.description: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read page
